text: First, let ’ s state the obvious : The lithe, lean build of a top model is a matter of hereditary luck, the result of a genetic supernova. And yet, even the world ’ s best bodies have to put in the proverbial work, approaching their high - intensity training schedules with the focus of a professional athlete — and, in many cases, honing in on the precise healthy eating plan that will keep them photo - ready 365 days a year. When it comes to the latter, there ’ s good news for mere mortals, who can benefit from their carefully chosen programs, too.
